patthana22.29:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in MN 5.)
patthana22.29:0.3_0: There is a bowl that’s imagining, which is immediate, a space on all sides.
patthana22.29:1.1_0: he doesn’t memorize the teaching for the text; he doesn’t want to listen to the teachings; he doesn’t give rise to the teachings; and he has a reason for the whole world.
patthana22.29:10.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana22.29:10.1_1: one hundred and twenty years old.
patthana22.29:11.1_0: Not taking pleasure only for trampling to the bed, nor to the mass of fire, and to thunder.
patthana22.29:12.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, even for the sake of worldly gain, the practice that leads to peace.
patthana22.29:13.1_0: for this reason, not that of stress, weariness, or decoration, nor a cause of attachment to rebirth.
patthana22.29:14.1_0: There’s no cause or condition to stop interrupting with the teaching and training. For when it comes to an end.
patthana22.29:2.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana22.29:3.1_0: if he doesn’t give a teaching to the text; he doesn’t remember the teachings; he doesn’t remember the teachings; he has no reason for leaving.
patthana22.29:4.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without itness.
patthana22.29:5.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana22.29:6.1_0: Not taking pleasure in form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
patthana22.29:7.1_0: Not taking pleasure in form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
patthana22.29:8.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
patthana22.29:9.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, even for the sake of worldly gain, the practice that leads to peace.
